_header: Honoured and blessed must He be
_description: Epilogue, praising God, to an alchemical tract in prose — one quatrain

CopenRoy248.First Lines: Onowryd and blyssed motte he be…
CopenRoy248.Editions:
Stephens,  George. 
             “Anecdota Literaria: Catalogue of the English Manuscripts in the Great
                National Library, Copenhagen.” 
             Retrospective Review
         2 (1854): 407-16: 409.
